mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VideoStatistic (videoId, dailyWatchedTime, dailyViewCount) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{dailyWatchedTime}, #{dailyViewCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dailyWatchedTime = VALUES(dailyWatchedTime), dailyViewCount = VALUES(dailyViewCount)

INSERT INTO VideoStatistic (videoId, weeklyWatchedTime, weeklyViewCount) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{weeklyWatchedTime}, #{weeklyViewCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE weeklyWatchedTime = VALUES(weeklyWatchedTime), weeklyViewCount = VALUES(weeklyViewCount)

INSERT INTO VideoStatistic (videoId, monthlyWatchedTime, monthlyViewCount) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{monthlyWatchedTime}, #{monthlyViewCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dailyWatchedTime = VALUES(monthlyWatchedTime), dailyViewCount = VALUES(monthlyViewCount)
INSERT INTO VideoStatistic (videoId, dailyWatchedTime, dailyViewCount) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{dailyWatchedTime}, #{dailyViewCount})
INSERT INTO VideoStatistic (videoId, weeklyWatchedTime, weeklyViewCount) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{weeklyWatchedTime}, #{weeklyViewCount})
INSERT INTO VideoStatistic (videoId, monthlyWatchedTime, monthlyViewCount) VALUES (#{videoId}, #{monthlyWatchedTime}, #{monthlyViewCount})
